subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Crosby homered against Barry Zito, Mark Ellis also homered and Dan Haren won his seventh consecutive decision yesterday, leading the visiting Oakland Athletics past the San Francisco Giants, 6-0.
snippet: Bobby Crosby homered against Barry Zito, Mark Ellis also homered and Dan Haren won his seventh consecutive decision yesterday, leading the visiting Oakland Athletics past the San Francisco Giants, 6-0.
